metadata.title: CVE-2024-4773 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: When a network error occurred during page load, the prior content couldhave remained in view with a blank URL bar. This could have been used toobfuscate a spoofed web site. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 126.

criterions.comment: firefox package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
thunderbird package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs52 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs68 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
